mapper.select: select r.r_id r_id, r.m_id m_id, r.r_cid r_cid, r.r_mpwp r_mpwp, r.r_date r_date, r.r_time r_time, r.r_pnum r_pnum, r.r_keepmoney r_keepmoney,r.r_tnum r_tnum,r.r_yn r_yn,r.s_name s_name , rv.rv_id rv_id, rv.rv_content rv_content from reservelist r LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select distinct rv.r_id rv_id, rv.rv_content from reservelist reserv inner join review rv on reserv.r_id = rv.r_id ) rv ON r.r_id = rv.rv_id where r.m_id= #{mId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservelist(r_id,m_id,r_cid,r_mpwp,r_date,r_time,r_pnum,r_keepmoney,r_tnum,r_yn,s_name) values(sysdate,#{mId},#{rCid},(SELECT s_mp FROM store WHERE r_cid = #{rCid}),sysdate,'19:00',0,0,0,'RW',#{sName})
